title: In the Palm of Your Hand
occurrences: May I look in the palm of your hand?
and today I forgot to tell you something I read in the palm of your hand.
A lot of money, soon, here! In the palm of your hand!
regex: \b((?!\bIn\ the\ Palm\ of\ Your\ Hand:)In\ the\ Palm\ of\ Your\ Hand)(?!\:)(?!'t)\b
